project_id.description: Identifier of the project that the milestone belongs to.

title.description: The title or name of the milestone.

description.description: A brief summary or goal of the milestone.

state.description: Current state of the milestone (e.g., open, closed).

created_at.description: The date and time when the milestone was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the milestone was last updated.

due_date.description: The target date for completion of the milestone.

start_date.description: The date when work on the milestone is scheduled to start.

expired.description: Indicates if the milestone has expired or not.

web_url.description: URL to access the milestone on the web platform.
